description:
## Strimzi

This dashboard provides insights into your Strimzi Kafka Kubernetes operators, such as the reconciliation status and custom resource definitions (CRDs) that each operator sees.

If you would benefit from visualizing the topology of your streaming data pipelines, or from investigating localized bottlenecks within your data streams setup, check out [Data Streams Monitoring](https://www.datadoghq.com/product/data-streams-monitoring/).

For monitoring your Kafka and Zookeeper nodes on your Strimzi cluster, please refer to the [Kafka](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kafka/?tab=host) and [Zookeeper](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/zk/?tab=host) integrations, respectively.
title: Strimzi Overview

definition.content:
**Strimzi**

This dashboard provides insights into your Strimzi Kafka Kubernetes operators, such the reconciliation status and custom resource definitions (CRDs) that each operator sees.

If you would benefit from visualizing the topology of your streaming data pipelines, or from investigating localized bottlenecks within your data streams setup, check out [Data Streams Monitoring](https://www.datadoghq.com/product/data-streams-monitoring/).

For monitoring your Kafka and Zookeeper nodes on your Strimzi cluster, please refer to the [Kafka](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kafka/?tab=host) and [Zookeeper](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/zk/?tab=host) integrations, respectively.

**Useful Links**

* [Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/strimzi)
* [Data Streams Monitoring](https://www.datadoghq.com/product/data-streams-monitoring/)
* [Monitoring Kafka With Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-kafka-with-datadog/)
* [Monitoring Kafka Performance Metrics](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kafka-performance-metrics/)
This section provides you with an overview of your system activity.  The monitor summary notifies you of any active Strimzi alerts.

definition.title: CPU System and Process Usage by Operator

definition.content: This section is specific to the *Cluster Operator*. It goes through resource utilization, number of reconciliations broken down by completion status, and garbage collection.
The memory usage is broken down by operator, and whether it is committed for the JVM or already in use. An anomalous memory usage can indicate a bottleneck.
This section is specific to the *Topics Operator*. It goes through resource utilization, number of reconciliations broken down by completion status, and garbage collection.
This section is specific to the *User Operator*. It goes through resource utilization, number of reconciliations broken down by completion status, and garbage collection.
